text:
"He was able to view the events of the previous evening and, as far as he could make out, that he was about to say was that..."

"Don't worry," said Ford. #DirkGentlysHolisiticDetectiveAgency

passages.fragment: He was able to view the events of the previous
passages.full_quote: <used>He was able to view the events of the previous</used> night with a cool detachment that he would not have expected

passages.fragment: the events of the previous evening and , as far as he could
passages.full_quote: He had been trying to write down on a piece of Dirk's notepaper all that he could remember of <used>the events of the previous evening and, as far as he could</used> pinpoint them, the times at which each had occurred

passages.fragment: , as far as he could make out , that he was about to
passages.full_quote: It was telling him, <used>as far as he could make out, that he was about to</used> have a very bad month, that things were going to go from bad to worse if he didn't get a grip on things and start making some positive moves and thinking things out for himself
She knew what <used>he was about to say</used> and thought him a terrible showoff

passages.fragment: was about to say was that ... '' `` Do n't
passages.full_quote: "What I <used>was about to say was that..." "Don't bother</used> please," said Trillian
"I don't know where Gordon is at the moment a<used>nd --" "Don't worry</used>"
"<used>Don't worry," said Ford</used>, "they haven't started yet."
